snippet: The fighting has ratcheted up tensions just as the two countries’ leaders have agreed to work together to de-escalate the situation.
abstract: India says that it has killed seven fighters and is still fighting others in a Pakistan-backed force of several dozen who crossed a mountainous border area with the aim of killing Indian troops.
lead_paragraph: The fighting has ratcheted up tensions just as the two countries’ leaders have agreed to work together to de-escalate the situation.

headline.main: India Says It Has Killed 7 in Clashes Along Pakistan Border
